snippet.title: NES Longplay [257] Lethal Weapon
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: JagOfTroy

Nine levels of boring, repetitive crap.
I was tired of playing this half-way through the first board but I forced myself to complete this so no one else would have to brave this piece of garbage.
Hardly any special weapons or power-ups, just your fists and a pistol to face an onslaught of repeating enemies.
The game doesn't seem to follow any of the movies whatsoever and the bosses couldn't be more unimaginative.
Only through half-way beating the game did I realize you have to walk off the screen to switch between Murdoch and Riggs.
Murdoch's melee attack seems to be stronger but since he can't jump as high as Riggs, it's practically impossible to dodge bullets which makes him utterly useless other than just being a meatshield for certain parts of the game.
I am so happy that I didn't waste money on this abomination when I was a kid and would say this is almost as bad as Cheetahmen except for the fact that the game actually does work.
And after all that... the ending sucks too. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
